content.raw:
I though removing initialization of the deprecated member error would fix the warnings, but I still get warnings:
~~~
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/Joint.cc: In constructor ‘gazebo::physics::Joint::Joint(gazebo::physics::BasePtr)’:
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/Joint.cc:46:17: warning: ‘gazebo::physics::Joint::dampingCoefficient’ is deprecated (declared at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/Joint.hh:485) [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/Joint.cc:46:17: warning: ‘gazebo::physics::Joint::useCFMDamping’ is deprecated (declared at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/Joint.hh:523) [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
~~~
I don't know of a way to deprecate individual member variables without generating compiler warnings.
content.html:
I though removing initialization of the deprecated member error would fix the warnings, but I still get warnings:

/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/Joint.cc: In constructor ‘gazebo::physics::Joint::Joint(gazebo::physics::BasePtr)’:
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/Joint.cc:46:17: warning: ‘gazebo::physics::Joint::dampingCoefficient’ is deprecated (declared at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/Joint.hh:485) [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/Joint.cc:46:17: warning: ‘gazebo::physics::Joint::useCFMDamping’ is deprecated (declared at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/Joint.hh:523) [-Wdeprecated-declarations]

I don't know of a way to deprecate individual member variables without generating compiler warnings.
